description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 4/26/2006

Ridge tries to apologize to Brooke over the phone but she hangs up when Nick arrives at her house.  Ridge confides in Taylor about what happened with Brooke.  Stephen then stops by Brooke’s as well.  Brooke asks to speak to her father alone.  When Nick leaves, Brooke fills her father in on what happened with Ridge. Stephen is there for Brooke. Christian tries to assure Felicia that everything will work out with Dino.
